name: apache-answer
description: Answer is a self-hosted Q&A platform where users ask and answer questions, similar to StackOverflow. It includes tags, markdown, voting, and moderation features, designed for teams or communities who want full data control.
features: Q&A Platform: Self-hosted knowledge sharing similar to StackOverflow. Build your community.
Tag System: Organize questions with tags for easy discovery and filtering. Find answers fast.
Markdown Support: Rich text formatting for questions and answers. Express ideas clearly.
Voting System: Community-driven quality through upvotes and downvotes. Best answers rise to top.
Moderation Tools: Built-in features for managing content and users. Maintain quality standards.
Full Data Control: All community knowledge stored on your own infrastructure. Complete ownership.
User Reputation: Gamification encourages quality contributions and participation. Engaged community.
